metadata.title: Cat Footwear Men's Argon Composite Toe Construction Shoe
features: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
ASTM F2413-11 Composite Safety Toe protects against impact or compression. ASTM F2413-05 1/75 EH Electrical Hazard Protection rated to protect against open circuits up to 600 volts in dry conditions
Strobel and Cement Construction provides superior flexibility and lightweight durability. Full Grain Leather or Pull Up Leather Uppers deliver long-term durability and protection
Nylon Mesh Lining for added breathability and comfort. Microfiber Sock Liner provides breathability
Dual Density EVA Footbed for cushioning comfort. Molded EVA Midsole offers additional shock absorption and all-day comfort
Nylon Shank for added support and stability. T901 Outsole performs against oil and water, and abrasion resistant.Slip Resistant Outsole reduces the risk of slips and falls on low tractions surfaces
description: Stand your ground with an authentic look thatâ€™s comfortable, flexible and filled with the safety requirements you need. Handcrafted in leather, The argon composite toe work shoe is geared toward light industrial work, and constructed in a way that offers superior flexibility and long-wearing durability. It offers the needed slip resistant properties to keep you on your feet at work, and protection against electrical hazards of open circuits up to 600 volts (in dry conditions). the reinforced safety toe, and durable outsole, complement this rugged style. The molded eva midsole provides you with additional shock absorption and will keep your legs feeling fresh all-day long.

As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
